passion.title: Privacy Preserving Proximity Tracing
passion.name: Thomas Haas & Fidel Thomet

remarks.value: Usually explaining a complex topic without conventional charts is a recipe for disaster, but this piece pulls it off beautifully. The elegant tracing and pulsing animations paired with well-paced scrollytelling keep you engaged throughout. In a year filled with top-notch COVID visualizations (we logged over 100 in this Twitter thread), this one still managed to stand out.
